title: Only My Dreams
description: A triumphant return to the big, sexy blockbuster.Alice Reynolds has always dreamed of escaping grimy south London to a life among the aristocratic elite. Those dreams come true when the friends and enemies she makes on a trip to Russia draw her into a completely different world. Fifteen years later, it's another journey to Russia – this time to procure a priceless Fabergé egg. This time, Alice’s fragile existence is shattered, and lethal secrets from the past are exposed. Once again, she is thrown together with the one man she could never forget.
author: Anna Blundy
